text:
$TON adoption accelerates: Following Robinhood, the Gemini listing paves the way for millions in the US to own $TON! 

At TON Strategy Co (Nasdaq: TONX), we are incredibly excited about this rapid growth. This milestone reinforces our conviction in the $TON thesis and highlights our strategy to support its adoption through capital markets as the leading public holder

Full details in press release: https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20250910820918/en/TON-Strategy-Company-Welcomes-%24TON-Trading-on-Gemini-Robinhood-and-Zengo-as-Ecosystem-Momentum-Builds
